amendatorysection.para: (1) Emergency medical reasons means the alleviation of a temporary shortage by transfers of prescription drugs between any of the following: (a) Holders of pharmacy licenses, (b) health care practitioner facilities as defined in section 71-414, and (c) hospitals as defined in section 71-419.
(2) Emergency medical reasons does not include regular and systematic sales to practitioners as defined in section 38-2838 of prescription drugs that will be used for routine office procedures.
